=== Summary ===
* As a member of <nowiki>[[JapaneseTeam|Japanese LoCo Team]]</nowiki> since August 2009, I attended FOSS events and made presentations to promote Ubuntu.
* I wrote articles about Ubuntu in Japan.

==== Launchpad ID ====
* https://launchpad.net/~nobuto

=== What I've done ===
==== Appearance in Events ====
===== Off-line Meetings =====
 '''Background information about Off-line Meeting:'''
  The events are organised by Ubuntu Japanese LoCo Team and usually attended by 60 people. Attendees can install Ubuntu to their computers with LiveCDs, USBs, SD cards or PXE. Besides they can listen in some presentations about Ubuntu.

* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntulinux.jp/Events/Offline200904Report|Ubuntu Off-line Meeting Tokyo 9.04]]</nowiki> (2009-04-25)
** As a staff
** As an install help staff - I assisted some people who have never installed Ubuntu.
** As a presenter - I made the presentation titled "Let's join Ubuntu Community" (for 25 minutes) which contains "How to sign up for Launchpad, Forums, Wiki, Mailing list and IRC" and "How to report bugs using Apport".
*** Slides: <nowiki>[[http://www.docstoc.com/docs/5713660/Ubuntu%E3%82%B3%E3%83%9F%E3%83%A5%E3%83%8B%E3%83%86%E3%82%A3%E3%81%AB%E5%8F%82%E5%8A%A0%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%BF%E3%82%88%E3%81%86Ubuntu%E3%82%AA%E3%83%95%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%83%9F%E3%83%BC%E3%83%86%E3%82%A3%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0Tokyo-904|Docstoc.com]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntulinux.jp/Events/Offline200904Report?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=Join_Ubuntu_community.pdf|PDF]]</nowiki>
*** Videos: <nowiki>[[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g70mqe74_P4|Part1]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1CMzY2VV48|Part2]]</nowiki>

* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntulinux.jp/Events/Offline200908Report|Ubuntu Off-line Meeting Tokyo 9.08]]</nowiki> (2009-08-01)
** As a staff

* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntulinux.jp/Events/OfflineTokyo201011/Report|Ubuntu 10.10 Release Party Tokyo]]</nowiki> (2010-11-06)
** As an organiser
** Pictures: http://picasaweb.google.com/106468260551425064278/Ubuntu1010ReleasePartyTokyo#

===== Open Source Conference =====
 '''Background information about <nowiki>[[http://www.ospn.jp/|Open Source Conference]]</nowiki>:'''
  The events tour a city a month throughout Japan. People who have an interest in FOSS not only Ubuntu are coming.

* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntulinux.jp/Events/OSC2009Kansai|Open Source Conference 2009 Kansai]]</nowiki> (2009-07-10,11)
** As a booth staff - I distributed Ubuntu CDs and explained what Ubuntu is, or answered questions about Ubuntu from visitors.

===== Magazines =====
====== Ubuntu Magazine Japan ======
 '''Background information about <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.asciimw.jp/|Ubuntu Magazine Japan]]</nowiki>:'''
  This is the first magazine specialised for Ubuntu in Japan. It is widely sold at book stores throughout Japan and published about 4 times a year.

* <nowiki>[[http://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/4048679961/|Vol.01]]</nowiki>: I wrote about 6 pages.

* <nowiki>[[http://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/4048686399/|Vol.04]]</nowiki>: 14 pages
* <nowiki>[[http://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/4048689789/|Vol.05]]</nowiki>: 16 pages

  This is a weekly series to introduce recipes for maximizing Ubuntu life quality. Ubuntu Japanese LoCo members take charge of the series respectively.

=== Testimonials ===

* Nobuto is one of the greatest Ubuntu evangelist in Japanese community. In particular, he organize a regular event "Ubuntu Hour in Tachikawa" for the purpose of creating opportunity to face Japanese - a beginner and a advanced - users. I believe that he and his work play an important role in the growth of Ubuntu community. -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:cosmos-door]]</nowiki>  * Nobuto's passion and sincerity have made him as good speechmaker.
